channel.title: Prayer level reset

item.title: Prayer level reset
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

clickingbuttons :

case 9178: int npcType = 2290; //resetallstat if(c.dialogueAction == 42) { //allstats if (c.inWild()) return; for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) { if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) { c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); c.getDH().sendDialogues(10006, 2290); return; } } try { int skill1 = 0; //attack int level = 1; c.playerXP[skill1] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(level)+5; c.playerLevel[skill1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(skill1); int skill2 = 1; //Defence // int level = 1; c.playerXP[skill2] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(level)+5; c.playerLevel[skill2] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill2]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(skill2); int skill3 = 2; //Stength // int level = 1; c.playerXP[skill3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(level)+5; c.playerLevel[skill3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill3]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(skill3); int skill4 = 3; //Hitpoints level = 10; c.playerXP[skill4] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(level)+5; c.playerLevel[skill4] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill4]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(skill4); int skill5 = 4; //Ranging level = 1; c.playerXP[5] = 0; c.playerLevel[5] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(5); int skill6 = 5; //Prayer // int level = 1; c.playerXP[skill6] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(level)+5; c.playerLevel[skill6] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill6]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(skill6); int skill7 = 6; //Magic // int level = 1; c.playerXP[skill7] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(level)+5; c.playerLevel[skill7] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill7]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(skill7); // c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); c.getDH().sendDialogues(9999, 2290); } catch (Exception e){} } FourOptions.handleOption1(c); break;

Dialoguehandler:

case 9997: sendOption4("Reset all combat stats.", "Reset Attack.", "Reset Strength", "Next"); c.dialogueAction = 42; c.nextChat = 9998; break;

item.title: Prayer level reset
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

how to fully reset my prayer ?

c.playerXP[skill5] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(level)+5; c.playerLevel[skill5] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill5]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(skill5); int skill6 = 5; //Prayer // int level = 1;

it becomes 99/1

because I was first level 99, it keeps the ‘prayerpoints’.
